Heroines

Would-be superhero Marcy Madison tries to assemble a team of like-minded heroines by placing an ad on Craigslist. But the response she gets is far weirder and more dangerous than she bargained for.

item.title: Dark Lily
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Dark Lily

She’s like you and me. She’s a reader and a dreamer. She has sisters and a mom. She’s a little bit unsure about that dress she has to wear to the Big Dance.

Then again, she isn’t like us. Living in a castle on the Moon doesn’t provide the adventure she craves and she wants nothing more than to do something fun and exciting!

ç›¸å…³ç§å­â¬‡Related Torrents

item.title: The Howling - Revenge of the Werewolf Queen
Rocket Queen and the Wrench
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Rocket Queen and the Wrench

What if Alfred Pennyworth had a daughter about Robinâ€™s age? What sorts of adventures would they have?

Those are the questions that led to Rocket Queen and the Wrench. Itâ€™s a story about heroes and villains, friendship and family, and appreciating the things we have in the face of the things we lose. Each miniseries takes place over the course of a summer, and each story explores the dangers of being a hero as well as the dangers of loving someone, whether family, friend, or something more. Rocket Queen and the Wrench offers all of the best features of superheroic fantasy: a rich setting, colorful heroes and villains, amazing locales, and more.

When budding delinquent Jamie Baldwin is sent to spend the summer with his estranged father, he has no idea that his father works for The Zoom Family, a premier team of armored heroes. But he soon learns the truth, and that blood ties are no less binding when youâ€™re the fastest thing on earth. Action and adventure ensue, as do joy, pain, and sacrifice. Itâ€™s hard to hang out with heroes without learning how to be one.

Iron Man meets Harry Potter in this superhero fantasy coming of age story.

item.title: Zombie Camp
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Zombie Camp

Camp Wanachompya is designed to teach young zombies how to survive the human apocalypse and Johnny has just been dropped off there, for the summer. It’s there that Johnny meets Sarge, the screaming, bodiless camp director. Between deadly obstacle courses, a human intruder, and a vegan, Johnny will have to fight to survive his first week at camp.

The Family Secret

Former CIA and superhero, current single mother Paola Cruz-Randall is just trying to pay the rent while raising her two teenagers with special powers of their own.

item.title: Mixtape
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Mixtape

A group of teens struggle with relationships, the future and their place in the world against the backdrop of the ‘90s music scene. A sincere love letter to 90s music.

item.title: Mage, Inc.
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Mage Inc.

The only thing Keira Zeleznovova wants is to be an apprentice at Mage, Inc., but her curmudgeon-y mentor always has one more Intent To Use Magic file to fill out. Through mishaps and trials as an unpaid intern, Keira quickly realizes that thereâ€™s more paperwork and near death experiences to magic than she could ever imagine. Maybe one day she’ll become a powerful mage in her own right.

item.title: Doorkickers
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Doorkickers

Comic book veteran Shon C. Bury and U.S. Army veteran Scott Mccullough team up as the creator/writer team for Doorkickers. With amazing and gritty art by Douglas Franchin and Michele Nucera, the Doorkickers come to life in this prologue issue.

The Doorkickers are an elite team from the Enhanced Services Directorate, a secret government organization that researches and fights the paranormal and supernatural. They’re SEAL Team 6 if SEAL Team 6 fought Lovecraftian horrors. This issue hits the ground running and doesn’t hold back on spectral-charged Reaver Rounds when it comes to fighting extra-dimensional entities!

Optimized for mobile devices, this Doorkickers issue has 20 story pages and a bonus memo to shed some light into the world of the ESD.

“This is what we need more of in the comic book industry!”

  • Frank Hannah, Filmmaker, Comic Book Writer

item.title: Big Game Hunters
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Big Game Hunters

All the monsters, creatures, and ghosts the world believes to exist only in storybooks and fairytales are actually out thereâ€”until Quinn and his ragtag band of monster hunters find and kill them. Quinnâ€™s hunters all have their own motivations. Some do it for Queen and Country. Most do it for revenge… Big Game Hunters is a fun, fast-paced romp around the Victorian world with a disparate band of monster hunters who take on real and invented mythological creatures, as well as denizens of traditional folklore from around the British Isles and beyond. In The Tale of the Lizard Baron, Quinn and the others rid the world of a Troll from the Scottish Highlands before setting sail to a small Prussian state to save a town from a mysterious evil.

item.title: Space Goat Presents
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

Space Goat Presents

Seven stories from the comic-industry’s most established and up-and-coming talent. Unleashed! Big Game Hunters, The Family Secrets, and Doorkickers start here. You’ll want to keep this hardcover volume on a shelf near you so you can read it over and over again.

item.title: 40 Coffins
item.description:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½ğŸ“¦ä»åœ¨å·¥äº‹ä¸­

40 Coffins

One by one, they disappear. The crew of the ship Demeter is traveling from Romania to Whitby, England with a mysterious cargo of coffins. As the crew is beset by a horrific killer, the remaining sailors turn on each other in fear and paranoia. Only when it’s too late, do they realize their cargo is actually the vampire Dracula.
